LanguageData.CreateGTBionicEye.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Eye
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicEye.description: The advanced version of the bionic eye. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicArm.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Arm
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicArm.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible strength. Not recommended for wardens that want to keep prisoners in one piece. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateCyberneticPowerArm.label: Upgrade Power Arm
LanguageData.CreateCyberneticPowerArm.description: Upgrades a power arm with artifical muscles. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicHand.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Hand
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicHand.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades that uses nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of arm upgrades, just replacing hands. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicFoot.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Foot
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicFoot.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of leg upgrades, just replacing feet. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicLeg.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Leg
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicLeg.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible speed. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicJaw.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Jaw
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicJaw.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano machinery to break down food instantly with minimal effort. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicEar.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Ear
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicEar.description: The advanced version of the bionic ear. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicSpine.label: Create Cybernetic Bionic Spine
LanguageData.CreateGTBionicSpine.description: The advanced version of the bionic spine. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTLung.label: Create Cybernetic Lung
LanguageData.CreateGTLung.description: A powerful vascular augmentation that replaces a standard human lung. The perfect pairing with a cybernetic heart as this increases circulatory speed which increases overall efficiency. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTStomach.label: Create Cybernetic Stomach
LanguageData.CreateGTStomach.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation that replaces a standard human stomach. It increases digestion efficiency and metabolic efficiency. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTLiver.label: Create Cybernetic Liver
LanguageData.CreateGTLiver.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation that replaces the standard human liver. It increases blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTKidney.label: Create Cybernetic Kidney
LanguageData.CreateGTKidney.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation that replaces a standard human kidney. It increases blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateGTHeart.label: Create Cybernetic Heart
LanguageData.CreateGTHeart.description: A powerful cardiac augmentation that replaces a standard human heart. Safely manages very high blood flow without overwhelming standard body parts. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CreateExoskeleton.label: Craft Exoskeleton
LanguageData.CreateExoskeleton.description: An exoskeleton greatly improves overall body perfomance. Produces 1.
